comment: In India AstraZeneca named as covishield. Does not know why they need change of name??! Just to misguide people as people will think just other vaccine is banned ..
amr:
# ::snt In India AstraZeneca named as covishield. Does not know why they need change of name??! Just to misguide people as people will think just other vaccine is banned ..
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / name-01
            :ARG1 (c / company
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "AstraZeneca"))
            :ARG2 (c2 / company
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Covishield"))
            :location (c3 / country
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "India")))
      :snt2 (k / know-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG0-of (c4 / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (n5 / need-01
                              :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                              :ARG1 (c5 / change-01
                                    :ARG0 t2
                                    :ARG1 (n6 / name)))))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt3 (m2 / misguide-01
            :ARG1 (p / person)
            :mod (j / just)
            :ARG1-of (c6 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (t3 / think-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person)
                        :ARG1 (b / ban-01
                              :ARG1 (v / vaccine
                                    :mod (o / other)
                                    :mod j))))))
